name: Asit C Mehta Investment Interrmediates Reviews

review.title: “Great place to work at if you are looking for personal and career development”
review.pros: Pros – Extensive focus on employee development and motivation.Good value sets and beliefs.Innovation and new ideas are much appreciated compared to other broking firms.
review.cons: Cons – Need to picture themselves as a more aggresive company.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Invest more in employees so that they translate the company vision to the customers perfectlyFocus on alternative channels for revenure generation( model for revenue generation should not be market oriented)

review.title: “it was great experiance at ACMIIL. proper working etmosphire provided by mgmt”
review.pros: Pros – proper working environment was given to each staff
review.cons: Cons – compensation is not attractive. but it was also not lesser in the industry
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “Great place to learn, superb value sets and very transparent”
review.pros: Pros – Huge amount of transparency in daily working with clients, employees and vendors.Hands-on Management with very strong ethics and value set.Very less politics in day-to-day work life, most of the fellow staff is friendly and helpful.
review.cons: Cons – Inefficient people are not dealt with as quickly as they usually are in other companies.Management sometimes makes ad hoc decisions.No canteen in Head Office.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Be more strict with non-performers.

review.title: “Excellent learning and opportunity to take newer responsibilities, roles and challenges”
review.pros: Pros – Challenging environment to growth one's career, opportunity to take higher role & responsibilities with department and across, and window of 'idea-plug' to be experimented, accessibility to seniors, sharing of learning from cross segments.
review.cons: Cons – difficult times across financial sector, particularly broking industry in terms of financial constraints; difficulty in numerating client engagement tools and techniques across the organization
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – resource management along with intelligence management will play key to organization's survival and development

review.title: “Good for learning and Freshser”
review.pros: Pros – Small organization gives following opportunity.Carrier Growth .Knowledge UpgradeSkills developmentAdd on responsibilityInteraction with different people for work
review.cons: Cons – Limited Financial growth.Carrier growth is limitedInterdepartmental development is not happening
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Need to retain good people for business growth

review.title: “Conservative Approach”
review.pros: Pros – Friendly work culture, moderate work pressure.
review.cons: Cons – No career path, below industry avg. salary, no value for talent & intellect, no aggression & competetiveness in doing business, impromptu decision making by senior management, etc...
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – gain focus in doing business, leverage on brand equity, retain talent, be aggressive in doing business, bring professionalism in conducting business....
